testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.quote: The organic farming training has transformed my agricultural practices. My crops are healthier and more productive.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.quote: Learning about Indian cow breeds and their importance has been enlightening. The center provides excellent guidance.

testimonials.name: Amit Patel
testimonials.quote: The cow-based economy training opened new business opportunities. Highly recommended for anyone interested in sustainable practices.

testimonials.name: Sunita Devi
testimonials.quote: The vermicompost training helped me create organic fertilizer at home. It's cost-effective and environmentally friendly.
